resources.string: To Windsward
I should find Marcel Dupont near Corinth in Windsward.
Speak to Marcel Dupont in Windsward
To Monarch's Bluffs
I should find Sir Payne Bennett near Prydwen in Monarch's Bluffs.
Speak to Sir Payne Bennett in Monarch's Bluffs
The First Step of Many
I should find this strange old man out in Windsward.
Speak to the old man in Windsward.
The Staff of Legend
I meet up with Yonas in Everfall to continue on my journey as a Soulwarden.
Speak with Yonas in Everfall.
To Brightwood
I should meet up with Yonas in Brightwood to continue my journey as a Soulwarden.
Speak with Yonas in Brightwood.
To Weaver's Fen
I should meet up with Ser Galahad in Weaver's Fen to investigate the Corpse Crone.
Speak with Ser Galahad in Weaver's Fen
To Great Cleave
I should meet up with Ser Galahad in Great Cleave to confront the Corrupted.
Speak with Ser Galahad in Great Cleave
To Edengrove
I should meet up with Sun Fuchun in Edengrove to search for the wizard Myrrdin.
Speak with Sun Fuchun in Edengrove
To Ebonscale Reach
I should meet up with Sun Fuchun in Ebonscale Reach to try and entreat help from the Empress.
Speak with Sun Fuchun in Ebonscale Reach
To Shattered Mountain
I should meet up with Yash Zafar in Shattered Mountain to prepare for our confrontation with the Tempest.
Speak with Yash Zafar in Shattered Mountain
I should speak with Yash Zafar about the desert lands known as Brimstone Sands.
Speak with Yash Zafar in Shattered Mountain
I should speak with Morgaine about the events in the lands once known as First Light.
Speak with Morgaine in Brimstone Sands
Faction Introductions
I should speak with the Faction Representatives to learn more about joining a Faction.
Speak with Faction Members to join a Faction
Talk to Florina about the Covenant
Talk to Aventus about the Syndicate
Talk to Tibbs about the Marauders
Learn to Craft
I should speak with Cemal Qadir about learning a crafting trade.
Speak with Cemal Qadir in Monarch's Bluffs
Learn to Craft
I should speak with Talesa Serrano about learning a crafting trade.
Speak with Talesa Serrano in Windsward
Acquire a Mount
I should seek out Jochi Khan in Everfall to see what he has to teach me.
Speak with Jochi Khan in Everfall
